participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and perspectives.
participant_1.background: i am pregnant with my first child. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.

participant_2.name: Larry

participant_2.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. spiderman is my favorite.

content.text: Do you move things around with your mind?
